mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_NO, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.ITEM_INFO, I.ITEM_IMAGE, I.BRAND, M.PAYMENT FROM ITEM I LEFT JOIN PAY P ON I.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON P.PAYMENT = M.PAYMENT WHERE M.M_IDX = #{m_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (M_IDX, ITEM_NO, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INFO, ITEM_STOCK, BU_NO, BRAND, READHIT, PAYMENT) VALUES(SEQ_M_IDX.NEXTVAL, ITEM_NO=#{item_no}, CATEGORY_NO=#{category_no}, ITEM_NAME=#{item_name}, ITEM_PRICE=#{item_price}, ITEM_INFO=#{item_info}, ITEM_STOCK=#{item_stock}, BU_NO=#{bu_no}, BRAND=#{brand}, READHIT=#{readhit}, PAYMENT=#{payment} )
